title: Harder General Knowledge Quiz 3 (50 Questions)
description: Challenging trivia across pop culture, history, science, geography, and technology.

items.q: Who created the TV series The Twilight Zone?
What year did Disney open its first theme park?
Which singer had a hit with 'Rolling in the Deep'?
What is the highest-grossing film of all time (not adjusted for inflation)?
Who played Tony Stark in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
What novel begins with the line 'Call me Ishmael'?
What band was Freddie Mercury the lead singer of?
Which Pixar film was the first to be released?
Who played the Joker in The Dark Knight (2008)?
Which artist painted The Persistence of Memory?
Who was the U.S. president during World War I?
Which U.S. state was the first to grant women the right to vote?
Who was the longest-serving British Prime Minister of the 20th century?
What year did India gain independence from Britain?
The Great Fire of London occurred in what year?
Who was the leader of the Soviet Union during World War II?
What is the Magna Carta?
items.a: A charter of rights agreed to by King John of England in 1215

items.q: Who was the first emperor of Rome?
In which U.S. city was John Lennon assassinated?
Who discovered America in 1492?
What is the chemical symbol for silver?
What part of the brain controls balance?
How many planets are in the Solar System?
Which organ produces insulin?
What is the most common gas in the Earth’s atmosphere?
What causes tides on Earth?
items.a: The gravitational pull of the Moon and the Sun

items.q: How many legs does a lobster have?
What mineral is the hardest known substance on Earth?
What’s the closest star to Earth?
What blood type is known as the universal recipient?
What is the capital of South Korea?
Which African country has the city of Timbuktu?
What is the capital of Switzerland?
Which river runs through Baghdad?
Which U.S. state is Mount Rushmore located in?
What is the tallest mountain in Africa?
Which continent is the driest?
Which European city has the landmark Sagrada Família?
What country is both in Europe and Asia?
What is the capital of Egypt?
What does HTML stand for?
What year was YouTube founded?
Which company made the first Macintosh computer?
What was the first widely used search engine before Google?
What is the name of Microsoft’s cloud service?
What company owns Instagram?
What programming language was created by Guido van Rossum?
What is the world’s most-used cryptocurrency?
What was the first video game console released by Nintendo?
What year was Wikipedia launched?
